amiti.name: Amiti
amiti.desc: Elincia only. Strikes twice. Grants Defense +3 and Resistance +3.

onager.name: Onager
onager.desc: Ignores user's strength, hits nearby units, cannot crit.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Restores HP equal to damage done to enemy.

thani.name: Thani
thani.desc: Micaiah only. Effective against cavalry and armors.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Increases vision in fog by 5 squares (effect lowers each turn).

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc: Can be used to increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn). Grants Speed +2 and Defense +2.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Repairs an ally's weapon to full uses.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Seals the enemy's ability to use magic.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Brings an allied unit next to the user.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Teleports an ally to a traversable square.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores HP of all allies within range.

matrona.name: Matrona
matrona.desc: Fully heals an unit's HP and moves their biorhythm to it's best point.

asherastaff.name: Ashera Staff
asherastaff.desc: Fully restores HP and status condition of all allies.

laguzgem.name: Laguz Gem
laguzgem.desc: Transforms laguz user for whole chapter.

shinebarrier.name: Shine Barrier
shinebarrier.desc: Places a tile that obstructs both ally and foe.

spectrecard.name: Spectre Card
spectrecard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

reapercard.name: Reaper Card
reapercard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

daemoncard.name: Daemon Card
daemoncard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: Buy items for half price (doesn't earn forging points 2).

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: Rank +1 for equipped weapon type (beorc only).

satorisign.name: Satori Sign
satorisign.desc: Teaches level 30+ laguz their mastery skill.

coin.name: Coin
coin.desc: Used to give a random bonus during weapon forging.

rudolgem.name: Rudol gem
rudolgem.desc: Raises Defense by 10, when in inventory.

beorcguard.name: Beorcguard
beorcguard.desc: Negates laguz effective bonus towards user (laguz only).

troopscroll.name: Troop Scroll
troopscroll.desc: Allows user to use up leftover movement after performing an action.
